3. Initial conditions file¶

This file defines the initial conditions of the model. To be deleted if the dimensions are changed.

Example: 
>>> from ic import X0

3.1. Global variables (state vectors)¶

  • X0 random (non-null) initial conditions.

3.2. Dependencies¶

>>> import numpy as np
